item.title: [Python] Flask introduction ~ Blueprint application note
item.description: Let's try the title as easily as possible. Blueprint allows you to implement the functionality of your application in pieces. Blueprint is officially recommended as a way to organize bloated projects. Install Flask $ sudo pip3 install flask Directory structure $ cd ~/workspace/sample-flask/ $ls server.py from flask import Flask app = Flask(__name__) @app.route('/') def func_1(): return'Hello world' @app.route('/test') def func_2(): return'Test' if __name__ =='__main__': app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=80, debug=True) Execution command $python3 server.
